attributes.action: Stop the plan to create an international travel database
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This has got to stop! All of these big brother monitoring of people and their movements is going to annoy the population more than annoy I would say! What are your plans after that a national database monitoring where everyone goes each day! Just put chips in our heads and monitor our thoughts as well why don't you! You are ruining this once great country and it needs to stop. People will riot if their freedom is removed from them you mark my words!

rejection.details: We are unawre of any such plan.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
